languages.text: {n}Рябь диссонанса пробегает по хору шепотов: они скрежещут негодованием, раздражением, отрицанием. Чуждая песнь больше не преисполнена безоговорочным превосходством.{/n}
{n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рябь диссонанса пробегает по хору шепотов: они скрежещут негодованием, раздражением, отрицанием. Чуждая песнь больше не преисполнена безоговорочным превосходством.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine leichte Dissonanz stört den kreischenden Chor der wütenden, gequälten und trotzigen Stimmen. Das Lied vermittelt kein Gefühl übermächtiger Überlegenheit mehr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine leichte Dissonanz stört den kreischenden Chor der wütenden, gequälten und trotzigen Stimmen. Das Lied vermittelt kein Gefühl übermächtiger Überlegenheit mehr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une onde discordante parcourt le chœur alors que ses voix révoltées hurlent à pleins poumons leur fureur et leur défiance. Désormais, le chant ne traduit plus un sentiment de supériorité accablant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une onde discordante parcourt le chœur alors que ses voix révoltées hurlent à pleins poumons leur fureur et leur défiance. Désormais, le chant ne traduit plus un sentiment de supériorité accablant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una onda de disonancia recorre el coro de voces, que chirrían con furia, frustración y desafío. Su canción ya no encierra esa nota de supremacía abrumadora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una onda de disonancia recorre el coro de voces, que chirrían con furia, frustración y desafío. Su canción ya no encierra esa nota de supremacía abrumadora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}合唱の中で、怒り、悔しさ、反抗の悲鳴が上がり、不協和音のさざ波が走る。歌にはもはや、圧倒的な優位性が感じられない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}合唱の中で、怒り、悔しさ、反抗の悲鳴が上がり、不協和音のさざ波が走る。歌にはもはや、圧倒的な優位性が感じられない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前的怪物尖叫起来，叫声中充满了愤怒、恼火与违逆，不和谐的涟漪在合唱中不断蔓延。怪物的歌声已经不再拥有压倒一切的力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的怪物尖叫起来，叫声中充满了愤怒、恼火与违逆，不和谐的涟漪在合唱中不断蔓延。怪物的歌声已经不再拥有压倒一切的力量。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Öfkeyle, üzüntüyle, isyankârlıkla çığlık atan korodaki seslere bir ahenksizlik dalgası yayılıyor. Şarkı artık baskın bir üstünlük hissi taşımıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ripple of dissonance runs through the chorus of voices as they screech in anger, vexation, defiance. The song no longer carries a sense of overpowering superiority.{/n}
